title: SMB Share Enumeration
description:
You run smbclient to enumerate shares on a Windows server:

$ smbclient -L //192.168.1.50 -N

Sharename       Type      Comment
---------       ----      -------
ADMIN$          Disk      Remote Admin
C$              Disk      Default share
IPC$            IPC       Remote IPC
Public          Disk      Public Files
HR_Backup       Disk      HR Department Backup

Shares ending with $ are hidden administrative shares. Which non-hidden share is most likely to contain sensitive employee data?

Submit as: flag{share_name}
hints: Ignore shares ending in $ â€” those are default Windows admin shares
HR departments handle employee personal information
A backup share for HR likely contains PII, payroll, or credentials
